name: Grelox: Colony 7 (ZX Spectrum Next)
description:
Grelox: Colony 7 is a 'digital comic' style adventure where you progress through the story by selecting directions and actions.

STORY
After shutting down the underground bases of crime boss Lady Mandrill, famed troubleshooter Grelox tracks her down to Colony 7. Determined to bring her to justice and discover the truth behind the huge creature she found under the surface of planet Aeon, Grelox lands outside the colony and prepares to enter...

INSTRUCTIONS
The commands are visible at the bottom of the screen, just push the relevant key on the keyboard (as shown in yellow) to activate them.
N, S, E and W will move you in those directions (if available). Some areas are only accessible after certain events have taken place.
LOOK gives you an overview of the locations you are in.
TALK allows you to chat the the character in that location.
ITEM will use any item you are carrying.
